Reviews.Title: Amazing 22" led tv that will not disappoint!
Reviews.Author: Mainspring (Texas)
Reviews.Content: I was in the market for a new tv for our travel trailer and since having excellent service from two other LG TV's I chose this one.I own the 720p 22" and the 26" 720p set also.They have very, very good picture quality and absolutely no problems.We do watch Netflix and get B.R.1080p disc sent to the house. I have larger TV's that are 1080p and didn't know if the picture would be better in the 22" size or not. However, the picture is amazing to say the least. My wife who isn't interested in tv even commented on the picture quality of this little tv. I haven't used it in our RV yet but I know it will produce a great picture when either watching OTA broadcast or when using our dish network hd satellite system.This tv is very thin and has great viewing at almost any angle.As far as the sound goes, it isn't as bad as some have reported for this size screen. It does have an earphone out on the back and optional powered speakers can easily to attached if wanted. I don't find the built-in speakers to be as bad as some report. A small tv just has small speakers and these do produce adequate sound.It only has one HDMI input but that should not be a problem.I am very pleased with this little tv and I know we will enjoy it when we put it in our travel trailer.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the cost.
Reviews.Author: Michael P
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my kitchen. A lot of screen in a small package. Picture was great and set-up was a non-event.I would have given it 5 stars if it came with a book of instructions rather than on-screen only.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good choice; lot of value
Reviews.Author: Kirk P. Nellans
Reviews.Content: Good picture, decent tuner, adequate sound.  Not a good choice for some cable customers, as it seemed to be confused when automatically scanning for channels at my office.  I'm using it at home with just an antenna connection and it works nicely; the on-screen descriptions of OTA broadcasts is appreciated.  The sound level seems above-average in its category.  I'm not crazy about the way they integrated the VESA mounts into the back of the housing.

Reviews.Title: Loved the Gift
Reviews.Author: Army girl
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for a friend stationed in Afghanistan.  The specs were perfect and the clarity is amazing. He loved it.
